subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After 12 seasons with the Minnesota Timberwolves, Kevin Garnett will join fellow All-Stars Ray Allen and Paul Pierce in Boston, making the Celtics instant contenders in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: After 12 seasons with the Minnesota Timberwolves, Kevin Garnett will join fellow All-Stars Ray Allen and Paul Pierce in Boston, making the Celtics instant contenders in the Eastern Conference.
